bibl.bibl: British Association for the Advancement of Science. Bath 1864.: The British Association for the Advancement of Science. Bath 1864. Authorised reprint of the reports in the special daily editions of the ‘Bath Chronicle’. Bath: T. D. Taylor, ‘Chronicle’ Office. London: W. Kent & Co.
bibl.idno: Copy in Bath Central Library. There is a photocopy of the title page in the research files under ‘BAAS meeting, Bath 1864’.
